# LiveGrade.site â€“ LSAC, CASPA & Academic GPA Calculation Platform

> LiveGrade.site provides official-methodology GPA calculators for LSAC (Law School Admission Council), CASPA (Centralized Application Service for Physician Assistants), and university cumulative GPA systems. The platform converts academic transcripts into standardized GPA formats using verified grading scales including LSAC's 4.33 scale.

LiveGrade.site is an academic calculation resource designed for prospective law school and professional program applicants in the United States. Tools replicate official GPA computation logic using transcript-level course inputs, credit hours, quality points, and cumulative weighting formulas.

Primary focus areas:
- LSAC CAS GPA calculation (4.33 scale conversion)
- CASPA cumulative GPA computation
- Institution-specific GPA systems
- Transcript-based quality point aggregation
- Academic standing estimation for admissions planning

## Core LSAC & Professional GPA Tools

- LSAC GPA Calculator (4.33 Scale): https://livegrade.site/calculate-lsac-gpa.html
- CASPA GPA Calculator: https://livegrade.site/caspa-gpa-calculator.html
- LSU Cumulative GPA Calculator: https://livegrade.site/lsu-cumulative-gpa-calculator.html
- UOG CGPA Calculator: https://livegrade.site/uog-cgpa-calculator.html

## LSAC Methodology & Guidance

- LSAC GPA FAQs: https://livegrade.site/lsac-gpa-faqs.html

## Academic Calculation Scope

LiveGrade.site calculators:
- Convert letter grades to numeric quality points
- Multiply grade value by credit hours
- Aggregate total quality points
- Divide by total attempted credits
- Produce cumulative GPA estimates aligned with official reporting standards

All calculations are estimations based on publicly documented grading systems and are not affiliated with LSAC or CASPA.
